snippet: As a presidential candidate in 2000, George W. Bush regularly showcased what his team called “tax families” to present a human face for those who would benefit from his tax-cutting plans. President Obama has adopted the idea.
abstract: As a presidential candidate in 2000, George W. Bush regularly showcased what his team called “tax families” to present a human face for those who would benefit from his tax-cutting plans. President Obama has adopted the idea.
